Night's Cavalry Helm in Academy of Raya Lucaria: In a chest along the Raya Lucaria rooftop path, accessed by looping around from Debate Parlor by dropping down past the rubble-strewn stairs. This is a side-side-path which involves crossing the bridge with four ornate spires, dropping down twice, and then carefully jumping to the rooftop to the west instead of dropping down to the west. Continue to drop down several more times and climb an extremely long ladder. Replaces Full Moon Crossbow.

Starlight Shards in Farum Azula: In a lidded chest behind where Recusant Bernahl invades, down the Great Bridge in the opposite direction from Maliketh. Replaces Old Lord's Talisman.
Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing [4] in Farum Azula: Under a Golden Seed tree guarded by four eagles. From Dragon Temple Rooftop, descend to the platform with the low-health AOE-spamming dragon, and double back along the right edge until you see a thatched red rooftop. Jump the gap to it and jump up again to find the tree. Replaces Golden Seed.
